Gain visibility: with SAP Internship Experience Program in your title, you'll have a global network of SAP leaders, entrepreneurs and career development opportunities at your fingertips What you'll do: Position Title: SAP iXp Intern - User Experience Designer Location: Vancouver, BC Expected Start Date: 4 May 2026 Contract Duration: 8 months Work Hours: Full-time; 40 hours per week We are looking for people who are eager to learn, creative and resourceful in getting things to work, and who are able to work independently and collaboratively. You are expected to: • Create UX and visual design specifications for SAP Business Data Cloud • Work closely with our developers and product experts to provide our customers with fresh, friendly, and elegantly simple user experiences no matter their function or role within the application • Engage with end users, customers and the product management team to better understand the needs and workflows of the end users, and collaborate on concepts for new functionality • Combine new design mock-ups with existing product features in workflows or videos to show that there is a meaningful story behind each feature request • Work with researchers to conduct usability testing • Provide UX sign off for development as features are developed for upcoming releases • Be adaptable to challenges and flexible with changes • Communicate and collaborate with colleagues across all levels, teams, location and willing to take ownership Meet your team: As a User Experience Designer on our team, you will be working with a group of exceptionally talented and motivated colleagues. Our development process follows the principle of continuous integration. We use design tools like Figma along with Jira in conjunction with in-house software. On our team you will work on designs for SAP Business Data Cloud, our SaaS solution for governing, managing, and visualizing data, as well as cooperate with developers and sales colleagues to deliver the best user experience for our customers.
